verses.roman:
sabā lañā kaila jagannātha-daraśana
sabā lañā āilā punaḥ āpana-bhavana

synonyms: sabā lañā—taking all of them; kaila—performed; jagannātha-daraśana—seeing Lord Jagannātha; sabā lañā—taking them all; āilā—went back; punaḥ—again; āpana-bhavana—to His own residence.
translation: Then Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and all His devotees visited Lord Jagannātha. Finally, accompanied by them all, He returned to His own residence.
